description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier allows an remote attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

product.name: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A and Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A

enisaIdProduct.product_version: (Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A 1.2.9 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A 1.2.9 and earlier)
